content.html: “A little boy whose family escaped Rwanda in 1994 and at age two, finds refuge in Scotland, where he grows up to become Doctor Who. That’s a story to be proud. With his huge talent and heart, I know Ncuti will make an amazing Doctor. How exciting.” Peter Capaldi on Ncuti Gatwa
content.value:
“A little boy whose family escaped Rwanda in 1994 and at age two, finds refuge in Scotland, where he grows up to become Doctor Who. That’s a story to be proud. With his huge talent and heart, I know Ncuti will make an amazing Doctor. How exciting.”

Peter Capaldi on Ncuti Gatwa
